column4: I need help with segfaulting apps - many of them, and reinstalling the base system didn't help
hmm... how would I know that?
it seems it should be in the grub meni.
you need to reboot to start it.
run it for a few passes
hmm... don't think so. I think my segfault problems are, in fact caused by GL
well now I can't start X - problem no. 1 :), but yes, and only some (xmms, mplayer, neverball...)
and reverting the drivers doesn't help?
The whole thing WAS caused by the 686 kernel :))
